item.description:
The South Shore Readers will be discussing the Booker Prize winning novel: The White Tiger by Aravind Adiga. We will meet in the cafe area in the front corner of Borders Book store. I will place a copy of the book on the table so that any new people can find us.

Borders is just off exit 17 on Route 3 and has plenty of parking. It is a 5 minute walk from the Braintree Red Line stop.

Please bring any book suggestions to help us pick future reads.


Past books read by this group can be viewed here: South Shore Reader's Book list
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the cafe area with a copy of the book on the table
item.name: South Shore Readers: The White Tiger
